net.sf.JRecord.Types

Class TypeFloat

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.Types.TypeChar
      • net.sf.JRecord.Types.TypeNum
        • net.sf.JRecord.Types.TypeFloat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Type

    public class TypeFloat
extends TypeNum
    Float / Double field Type

    This class is the interface between the raw data in the file and what is to be displayed on the screen for Float or Double fields

    Version:
    0.55
    Author:
    Bruce Martin
